params._expiry: Expiry date of cover right token
params._generation: Generation of priority pool & crToken (1 if no liquidations occurred)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

deployCRToken(string,uint256,string,uint.notice: Deploy Cover Right Token for a given pool

userdoc.notice: Factory for deploying crTokens         Salt as index for cover right tokens:             salt = keccak256(poolId, expiry, genration)         Factory will record whether a crToken has been deployed         Also record the generation of a specific crToken         And find the address of the crToken with its salt
